tweet: The Cardano roadmap has been updated! Check out the latest here:   https://t.co/uOThpgSdbj

#Cardano Quick Review  $ADA born in Oct 2017 & traded the lows of 254 Sats before 30x pump to 9180 Sats & one way dumped to 1673 before another pump to 4184  Many noobs are stuck with $ADA at high prices. We are now back to the lows  Classic Pump & Dump So far  Check Buy Zones ✅  https://t.co/BJegXSPcoI

Cardano Foundation will be attending community meetups in Poland in August. We'll be joined by IOHK's Director of Engineering, Duncan Coutts, so you don't want to miss out. RSVP today! Warsaw:  https://t.co/2veWOxd0tj and Krakow:  https://t.co/YbN8tOGZPi

Meet and get to know other Cardano community members, no matter where they are in the world! The Cardano Forum helps bring our community closer. Register here:  https://t.co/HYinN8XDVB and be sure to introduce yourself to everyone!  https://t.co/QNo53OhSL8

Education Director @LarsBrunjes explains the DAO Attack on #Ethereum and shows that the same attack does not work in IELE, which has been designed from the ground up with security in mind. Watch the video here:  https://t.co/QBP7H54Hr9 #Cardano @cardanocom

In this video, IOHK Director of Education Lars Brunjes explains how to install the mallet command-line tool and how to use it to compile, deploy and test smart contracts written in Solidity on the IELE-Testnet.  https://t.co/CJy5A35sZR #Cardano @cardanocom @CardanoStiftung
